name: A. Mahmoud and Ehab and the MEX
statement:
Dr. Evil kidnapped Mahmoud and Ehab in the evil land because of their
performance in the Evil Olympiad in Informatics (EOI). He decided to
give them some problems to let them go.Dr. Evil is interested in sets,
He has a set of integers. Dr. Evil calls a set of integers if the of it
is exactly . the of a set of integers is the minimum non-negative
integer that doesn’t exist in it. For example, the of the set is and the
of the set is .Dr. Evil is going to make his set . To do this he can
perform some operations. During each operation he can add some
non-negative integer to his set or erase some element from it. What is
the minimal number of operations Dr. Evil has to perform to make his set
?
file_name: D:\scoala\RESEARCH\MLCP\01_CODEFORCES_DATASET\DIV2\A. Mahmoud and Ehab and the MEX.json
